articles.title: RFK Jr.'s vaccine policy sparks a lawsuit from the American Academy of Pediatrics - NPR
articles.description: AAP and other leading health organizations allege that the health secretary violated federal law when he took the COVID vaccine off the list of recommended shots for pregnant women and healthy children.

articles.title: The health of U.S. kids has declined significantly since 2007, a new study finds - NPR
articles.description: A new study in the journal JAMA finds the health of America's children has worsened across several key indicators over the last two decades. That includes the number of children with chronic diseases.
